projects.name: Dailo
projects.description: Dailo transforms educational content into interactive podcast-style conversations using AI. Learn hands-free while commuting or exercising, with the ability to ask questions anytime. Perfect for busy professionals who want to make the most of their time.

problemSolution.problem: Traditional online learning requires screen time and active engagement, making it difficult for busy professionals to fit education into their daily routines. Existing audio content like podcasts lacks structure and interactivity, limiting effective learning.
problemSolution.solution: Our platform transforms learning into an interactive audio experience that combines the casual engagement of podcasts with the structure of formal courses. Users can learn hands-free while commuting or exercising, pause to ask questions, and maintain steady progress through structured content—all through AI-generated conversations that adapt to their learning style and pace.

targetAudience: Busy professionals seeking efficient learning during daily activities
Students who prefer audio learning over traditional reading
Lifelong learners who enjoy podcast-style content

keyFeatures.title: Podcast-courses
keyFeatures.description: Educational content delivered in an engaging podcast format

keyFeatures.title: Real-time interaction
keyFeatures.description: Users can pause and ask questions at any point

keyFeatures.title: Knowledge test
keyFeatures.description: Interactive knowledge assessment with course with badges and course completion

keyFeatures.title: Episode generation
keyFeatures.description: Additional individual episodes can be generated by the user

keyFeatures.title: Host and difficulty selection
keyFeatures.description: Customizable learning experience with choice of AI host personalities and content complexity levels

steps: Select a course and customize learning preferences (host personality and difficulty level)
Listen to AI-generated podcast-style episodes with natural conversations between host and guest
Interact freely by pausing to ask questions or take knowledge checks
Generate additional episodes on specific topics you want to explore further
Track progress and earn completion badges as you advance through the course

creditUsage.description: Listen to existing podcast-courses with standard host personality. Premium features include episode generation ($0.25 per episode), custom host personalities, and knowledge tests. Monthly subscription available for frequent users.
examples: Generate new episodes (10 included with subscription)
Custom host personalities included with subscription

members.name: Miguel la Corte
members.bio: Miguel is a skilled developer with a special blend of expertise in audio, web and blockchain technologies. His work has been presented within CTM Festival 2023 in Berlin, Goethe Institute Venezuela and within HKW Berlin, Centre Pompidou in Paris and CCCB in Barcelona through the Cultures d'avenir program

members.name: Moritz Stellmacher
members.bio: Moritz Stellmacher is a tech entrepreneur with expertise in marketing and blockchain. After scaling a marketing agency and serving as CEO of Abend, he co-founded the leading blockchain education platform Dacade. Currently a partner at Ape Unit, focusing on blockchain development.

projects.name: Talens
projects.description: Talens is an AI-powered talent assessment platform that transforms traditional hiring processes into intelligent, automated evaluations focusing on soft skills. Perfect for companies seeking to tap into emerging market talent pools.

problemSolution.problem: Current talent assessment solutions focus primarily on technical skills, missing crucial soft skills needed in the AI era. Traditional assessment methods can't scale effectively, especially for emerging markets, making it difficult for companies to identify and validate talent efficiently.
problemSolution.solution: Our platform transforms talent assessment through AI-powered interviews and evaluations that combine multimodal interactions with comprehensive skill analysis. Companies can efficiently assess candidates through automated, responsive interviews that evaluate both technical and soft skills, while candidates can showcase their abilities through a more natural, conversation-based assessment process.

targetAudience: HR professionals looking for scalable soft skill assessment solutions
Companies seeking to hire talent from emerging markets
Job seekers wanting to showcase both technical and soft skills
Organizations transitioning to remote hiring processes

keyFeatures.title: AI-driven assessments
keyFeatures.description: Customized interview tasks designed by AI

keyFeatures.title: Multimodal interviews
keyFeatures.description: Voice-based interactions with AI for natural assessment

keyFeatures.title: Comprehensive analysis
keyFeatures.description: In-depth evaluation of both technical and soft skills

steps: AI designs customized interview tasks to assess candidate soft skills
Conducts fully automated responsive interviews using multimodality
Provides in-depth analysis of candidate performance and potential
Connects pre-vetted talent with global opportunities

creditUsage.description: Talens operates on a subscription-based model where companies can access our AI-powered assessment platform through different tiers. Each subscription includes a monthly allocation of assessments and features, with the ability to purchase additional assessments as needed.
examples: Basic Plan: 10 assessments/month, basic analytics, standard support - $99/month
Professional Plan: 50 assessments/month, advanced features, priority support - $399/month
Enterprise Plan: Unlimited assessments, custom integration, dedicated support - Custom pricing
Talent Premium Access: Unlimited assessments, career insights, priority matching - $199/year

members.name: Fabian Tröltzsch
members.bio: Fabian Tröltzsch is a seasoned entrepreneur and business coach who has coached over 300 international freelancers to six-figure success.

members.name: Moritz Stellmacher
members.bio: Moritz Stellmacher is a blockchain developer, entrepreneur and founder of Dacade, a leading blockchain training platform since 2017.

members.name: Nathania Wong
members.bio: Nathania Wong is a Community and growth manager with over three years' experience in training platforms.

projects.name: Wavv
projects.description: Wavv is a social coordination platform that transforms chaotic group planning into seamless, real-time availability signaling. Perfect for socially active individuals seeking spontaneous connections and efficient social planning.

problemSolution.problem: Current social coordination tools like group chats and private messages are messy and inefficient, creating confusion around planning. Organizing meetups requires juggling multiple conversations and platforms, while people often miss out on spontaneous plans due to poor visibility of friends' availability.
problemSolution.solution: Our platform revolutionizes social coordination through one-tap availability signaling and real-time friend activity tracking. Users can instantly signal their availability and see which friends are free to hang out, while maintaining privacy through selective sharing controls.

targetAudience: Web3-native users interested in tokenized social platforms

keyFeatures.title: Real-time friend activity
keyFeatures.description: Overview of friends' plans and availability

keyFeatures.title: Privacy controls
keyFeatures.description: Selective sharing with specific friends or groups

keyFeatures.title: Token-based features
keyFeatures.description: Advanced capabilities unlocked through platform tokens

keyFeatures.title: Professional accounts
keyFeatures.description: Enhanced visibility for businesses and influencers

steps: Signal your availability with a single tap
Choose who sees your availability status
See which friends are free and what they're planning
Use credits to unlock premium features

creditUsage.description: Wavv operates on a freemium model with basic features available to all users and premium features unlocked through token ownership or subscription plans.
examples: Basic Features: Availability signaling, friend activity viewing - Free
Premium Features: Group creation, future event planning, Calendar integration, location sharing - $9.99/month
Professional Accounts: Event pinning, enhanced visibility - $29.99/month
